text:
- Trying to break into the
tech field on my own was

extremely confusing and
difficult to navigate.

The AWS Cloud Institute
felt like a program

that was directly guided in
order to provide the best steps.

The instructor led sessions,
the e-learning, the labs,

it all comes together in a
way that's easy to understand.

who hasn't been in a learning
environment in some time.

The comradery within
AWS Cloud Institute is
Everyone is banding together in order
to help push each other forward.
The most surprising thing has been

This isn't just your standard
course where you're going

to sign up, have modules,
and just hit submit.

This is an actual thriving
learning community.
I now have the confidence to understand
that I do belong in this industry.
